name: Strawberry Crush
instructions: crush 2 strawberries in a glass, add 3 basil leaves, 1/3 strawberry vodka and 1/3 lemonade, stir, and add ice.

name: Spicy Margarita
ingredients: tequila, triple sec, lime juice, lime, jalapeno
instructions: in the glass combine 1/3 of tequila, 1/4 of triple sec and splash of lime juice, transfer to shaker with ice, stir back to the glass, add jalapeno and lime wedge

name: Passion Daiquiry
ingredients: rum, triple sec, lime juice, passion fruit puree or juice
instructions: in the glass with ice combine 1/3 of rum, 1/4 of triple sec, 1/4 of passion fruit juice os tablespoon of puree, splash of lime juice and stir, or blend in blender

name: Lychee Martini
instructions: in the glass combine 1/3 of vodka and 1/3 of lychee juice, transfer to shaker with ice, stir back to the glass, add lychee

name: Mimosa
instructions: pour champagne in 2/3 of the flute, add a splash of orange juice, garnish with orange and mint

name: Bellini
instructions: pour champagne in 2/3 of the flute, add a splash of peach juice, garnish with slice of peach

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: in a mug pour coffee, add a splash of whiskey, and top off with whipped cream

name: Aperole Spritz
instructions: in a glass with ice combine 1/3 of each ingredients, stir, garnish with orange twist

name: Berry Iced Tea
ingredients: iced tea, strawberry and raspberry lemonade, berry mix (can be fresh or frozen), lemon
instructions: pour ingredients in the pitcher overs ice, add berries, lemon slices and stir

name: Youth Cocktail
instructions: pour soda in the pitcher over ice, add mint, slices of cucumbers, lemon and stir

name: Tropical Paradise
ingredients: pineapple juice, mango juice, seltzer, mango, pineapple, strawberry
instructions: pour juices in the pitcher over ice, add seltzer, fruits and strawberries for a color

name: Citrus Fiesta
ingredients: orange juice, grapefruit juice, seltzer, orange, tangerine
instructions: pour juices in the pitcher over ice, add seltzer, slices og orange and tangerine wedges

name: Grapefruit Bourbon
ingredients: bourbon, triple sec, grapefruit juice, grapefruit,basil
instructions: in a pitcher with ice add 1/3 of bourbon, 1/3 of grapefruit juice, 1/4 of triple sec, grapefruit slices and basil (optional for pop of color

name: Margarita
ingredients: tequila, triple sec, lime juice, seltzer, limes, salt in the saucer (optional)
instructions: in the pitcher with ice add 1/3 tequila, 1/4 triple sec, 1 oz of lime juice, top off with seltzer, add lime slices

name: Rosemary Gin Fizz
ingredients: gin, lemon juice, lime juice, rosemary sprigs, seltzer, sugar
instructions: combine 1/3 of gin, 1/3 of seltzer and 1/3 of mix of lemon and lime juice, add sugar and rosemary sprigs, stir thoroughly

name: Raspberry Lemonade
ingredients: vodka, lemonade, raspberry lemonade, raspberries, lemon
instructions: in a pitcher with ice add an equal parts of liquid ingredients, add raspberries and lemon slices
